attributes.action: Remove the Speaker Michael Martin from the house
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This person clearly does not represent the best interests of the country. He appears to be self serving or trying to preserve secrecy of an old boys network. 
He does not represent the transparency and integrity that the British public expect of their democratic system.
It is also intolerable that due to tradition, this person sits immune to the workings of democracy and cannot be voted away. He is "simply the worst Speaker in living memory" (Melanie Phillips, Daily Mail, 25 February 2008)

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
